text: William Betts (26 March 1864 – 8 August 1941) was an English footballer who played for The Wednesday, as well as the English national side. Betts played as a centre-half and made a total of 143 appearances in two spells for The Wednesday, scoring four goals. ==References== ==External links== * *Player profile at the FA.com *Player profile at the Sheffield Wednesday Archive Category:1864 births Category:1941 deaths Category:Footballers from Sheffield Category:English footballers Category:England international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Pyebank F.C. players Category:Heeley F.C. players Category:Sheffield Wednesday F.C. players Category:Lockwood Brothers F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Billy Betts
